node.title: Directors Guild Nominations Give Jane Campion Momentum
node.alt: Jane Campion, with the associate producer Phil Jones, on the set of “The Power of the Dog.”
node.description: The “Power of the Dog” filmmaker is the sole women on a list that includes Steven Spielberg and Paul Thomas Anderson.
node.content: ["Nominations for the Directors Guild Awards were announced on Thursday. Here are the major film and television categories. For the complete list, including commercials, reality shows and children\u2019s programming, go to dga.org.", "Feature", "Paul Thomas Anderson, \u201cLicorice Pizza\u201d", "Kenneth Branagh, \u201cBelfast\u201d", "Jane Campion, \u201cThe Power of the Dog\u201d", "Steven Spielberg, \u201cWest Side Story\u201d", "Denis Villeneuve, \u201cDune\u201d", "First-Time Feature", "Maggie Gyllenhaal, \u201cThe Lost Daughter\u201d", "Rebecca Hall, \u201cPassing\u201d", "Tatiana Huezo, \u201cPrayers for the Stolen\u201d", "Lin-Manuel Miranda, \u201cTick, Tick \u2026 Boom!\u201d", "Michael Sarnoski, \u201cPig\u201d", "Emma Seligman, \u201cShiva Baby\u201d", "Documentary", "\u201cAscension,\u201d Jessica Kingdon", "\u201cAttica,\u201d Stanley Nelson", "\u201cExterminate All the Brutes,\u201d Raoul Peck", "\u201cSummer of Soul,\u201d Ahmir \u201cQuestlove\u201d Thompson", "\u201cThe Rescue,\u201d Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi and Jimmy Chin", "Drama series", "\u201cSuccession,\u201d Kevin Bray (for the episode \u201cRetired Janitors of Idaho\u201d)", "\u201cSuccession,\u201d Mark Mylod (\u201cAll the Bells Say\u201d)", "\u201cSuccession,\u201d Andrij Parekh (\u201cWhat It Takes\u201d)", "\u201cSuccession,\u201d Robert Pulcini and Shari Springer Berman (\u201cLion in the Meadow\u201d)", "\u201cSuccession,\u201d Lorene Scafaria (\u201cToo Much Birthday\u201d)", "Comedy series", "\u201cHacks,\u201d Lucia Aniello (\u201cThere Is No Line\u201d)", "\u201cTed Lasso,\u201d MJ Delaney (\u201cNo Weddings and a Funeral\u201d)", "\u201cTed Lasso,\u201d Erica Dunton (\u201cRainbow\u201d)", "\u201cTed Lasso,\u201d Sam Jones (\u201cBeard After Hours\u201d)", "\u201cThe White Lotus,\u201d Mike White (\u201cMysterious Monkeys\u201d)", "Television Movies and Limited Series", "\u201cThe Underground Railroad,\u201d Barry Jenkins", "\u201cDopesick,\u201d Barry Levinson (\u201cFirst Bottle\u201d)", "\u201cStation Eleven,\u201d Hiro Murai (\u201cWheel of Fire\u201d)", "\u201cDopesick,\u201d Danny Strong (\u201cThe People vs. Purdue Pharma\u201d)", "\u201cMare of Easttown,\u201d Craig Zobel"]
